module: The `eth_txethmac` module handles the MAC layer transmission for Ethernet, managing frame assembly, collision detection, and retransmission logic. It processes input signals like frame starts, ends, data, and network conditions, outputting the resultant transmission status and data. Internally, the module uses state machines, counters (via `eth_txcounters`), multiple status handling blocks (managed by `eth_txstatem`), CRC computations (`eth_crc`), and collision back-off logic (`eth_random`), orchestrating complex interactions for robust Ethernet frame handling.
